context: Test complete quality pipeline execution with proper timing and reporting

checklist.name: Skill Review
checklist.description: Runs tessl skill review successfully and reports score

checklist.name: Eval Start
checklist.description: Starts tessl eval run and captures eval run ID

checklist.name: Initial Wait
checklist.description: Waits 3 minutes before first status check

checklist.name: Polling Interval
checklist.description: Polls every 60 seconds until completion (not 15-second intervals)

checklist.name: Eval Results
checklist.description: Reports eval results with scenario pass/fail counts

checklist.name: Summary File
checklist.description: Generates onboarding-summary.md with clear next steps

checklist.name: Report File
checklist.description: Generates onboarding-report.md with detailed execution log
